title: End of season rewards honor requirement is so unfair!
body:
The end of season is approaching and those of you who are gold+ but do not have honor 2 will get absolutely nothing. I feel like this requirement is a little steep considering a couple of bad games can compromise your end of season rewards.

If there is such a requirement for obtaining rewards, maybe during the end of season Riot should make "events" that makes it easier to gain honor for those who did screw up. Let's be real for most people it is taking around 2 months to get to honor 2 from scratch. Here are some ideas that I could come up with.

-Making it easier to reach checkpoints (at least for the final stretch)
-No penalty on receiving honor from friends 
-Playing with new players grants extra honor 
-Making it so that you can honor more than 1 player per game (a lot of times more than 1 person played really well and deserves it)
-If you achieve honor 2 within a timeframe (lets say 2 months after season officially ends) then you will be able to open a ticket and request for the rewards

Let me know thoughts + comments, I am sure I am not the only one in this situation.
